name: Overrun-Survive
description:
Overrun Survival is a "Horde mode" top-down shooter made for the Quarantine Jam made in 2 days.

Your Goal is to defend your "Time Core" against the attacking alien horde. But you haven't enough gun power to hold your base on your own. Each time your core gets destroyed it sends you back in time. Now you fight side by side with your past self. Upgrade your equipment and build defenses for your survival.

Controls:

Move with W,A,S,D

Aim with your mouse

Press left mousebutton to show your skill indicator and press it again to activate your skill
